segments.text: Hello , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to apply for a job you posted on the Internet yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Service Technician . How can I apply for this position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to fill out an Application Form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is on the desk over there . Be sure to fill out everything . Don ’ t leave any blank spaces . When you ’ re done bring the application to me .
segments.speaker: S1
